com.nsqre.insquare.Message

Class MessageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MessageAdapter.MessageHolder>
      • com.nsqre.insquare.Message.MessageAdapter

  • public class MessageAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MessageAdapter.MessageHolder>
    The adapter for the message list that the user views in the ChatActivity

      • getItemViewType

        public int getItemViewType(int position)
        Returns the view type of the message in a certain position 0 for text message from someone else, 1 for text message from me 2 for photo from someone else, 3 for photo from me 4 for outgoing photo, 5 for outgoing text message
        Overrides:
